name: primality
content:
primality noun [U]
(ORIGINS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal the state of being primal (= relating to an early stage of development, or to the time when human life on earth began) : A forest can be a place of primality and confusion. Clearly there’s a primality to eating, fulfilling one of our most basic needs. Related word
primal

Crude and basic
primality noun [U]
(MATHEMATICS)
mathematics
  specialized the fact of being a prime number (= a number that cannot be divided by any other number except itself and the number 1) : Volunteers are given specific numbers to test for primality. This computer program can be used to test the primality of numbers.
